subject: Football
Rodeos
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers plays Kansas State on Thursday night in the Texas Bowl. But on Tuesday night, Kansas State beat Rutgers in the rodeo bowl, where players dressed a calf in women’s underwear and tossed cow dung.
snippet: Rutgers plays Kansas State on Thursday night in the Texas Bowl. But on Tuesday night, Kansas State beat Rutgers in the rodeo bowl, where players dressed a calf in women’s underwear and tossed cow dung.
